I am following up today on the scheduled shipment of rapid tests from fed govt to long term care facilities 

https://miami.cbslocal.com/2020/07/20/nursing-homes-more-money-needed-covid-19-fight/ 

Media is now reporting on trends in #Florida nursing homes that I warned about 4 days ago in tweet below ⬇️ https://twitter.com/marcorubio/status/1283808410140540929 QT @marcorubio Closely watching rates in #Florida long term care facilities.

Have had a 99% increase in residents cases & 148% increase in staff cases since 14 June. 

Fed Govt is readying shipments of rapid tests to all 15,000 U.S. nursing homes facilities. First 2,000 will go out next week.

Our proposal for a 2nd round of #PPP loans is being finalized

Will be targeted at #smallbusiness that:
-meet current SBA standards &/or have 300 workers or less -have substantial revenue loss 

Will also provide a special focus on those located in low income neighborhoods

RT @JohnJamesMI America is the only country where you can go from slave to Senator in 4 generations & poverty to prosperity in 1. I am the result of the American Dream because of others’ sacrifices. The next chapter will take all of us working together to build a better future for our kids. http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1285333322848243713/pu/img/LVbeUKJJFT8HJxlj.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1285333322848243713/pu/vid/480x270/sXcT5wl1ZrPEStii.mp4?tag=10

We intended to help them when we wrote the bill & I hope none of them cave to pressure to return the money. 

https://www.miamiherald.com/news/local/education/article244111357.html

I never spoke to Rep. Yoho before he decided to accost me on the steps of the nation’s Capitol yesterday.

Believe it or not, I usually get along fine w/ my GOP colleagues. We know how to check our legislative sparring at the committee door.

But hey, “b*tches” get stuff done. 🤷🏽‍♀️ https://twitter.com/qpyoungnews/status/1285569396853952517 QT @qpyoungnews "Fucking bitch" says Florida's @RepTedYoho while accosting @AOC on the steps of the U.S. Capitol, according to report https://thehill.com/homenews/house/508259-ocaasio-cortez-accosted-by-gop-lawmaker-over-remarks-that-kind-of

The Senate needs to act now to contain this virus and provide the funding so our economy, schools, and families can begin to recover.

Here’s my must-do list in the @NYTimes:
https://www.nytimes.com/2020/07/21/opinion/elizabeth-warren-relief-bill.html

RT @RubenGallego I have suggested the same thing that @aoc has poverty & unemployment lead to crime. Weird neither Yoho or any other member has ever talked to me that way. https://twitter.com/katiebowill/status/1285558086871273474 QT @KatieBoWill In an exchange reported by @RealMikeLillis, Rep. They parted. "Yoho offered a parting thought to no one in particular."

'Fucking bitch.'" https://thehill.com/homenews/house/508259-ocaasio-cortez-accosted-by-gop-lawmaker-over-remarks-that-kind-of

RT @RepDeanPhillips Like @aoc, I believe poverty to be a root cause of crime. Wonder why Rep. Yoho hasn’t accosted me on the Capitol steps with the same sentiment? #shameful https://twitter.com/aaronblake/status/1285563399691284481 QT @AaronBlake Rep. Ted Yoho (R-Fla.) reportedly got into a confrontation with AOC, in which he called her "disgusting" and concluded by saying, "Fucking bitch."

What’s wild to me @RogerWilliamsTX is why would you blatantly lie to a reporter who saw this exchange?

You were yelling at me too, about “throwing urine.”

Gotta love Republican courage from Rep @RogerWilliamsTX: when he undeniably sees another man engaged in virulent harassment of a young woman, just pretend you never saw it in the most cartoonish manner possible and keep pushing.

(He’s lying, by the way. He joined in w/ Yoho) https://twitter.com/pdshinkman/status/1285570152575250432 QT @PDShinkman @KatieBoWill @RealMikeLillis @AOC Third member of Congress who witnessed the exchange when asked later, demurs: "I was thinking about some issues I've got in my district that need to get done."

Our democracy has been beaten up badly. But when people ask me why I’m still hopeful that we can make real change, I remind them of what happened 10 years ago today. We took on an impossible David vs Goliath fight to hold Wall Street accountable – and won. And we can do it again.

We also wouldn’t have a strong @CFPB without people like you. The financial industry spent $1 million a day fighting Wall Street reform – especially the agency. But people & groups all across the country jumped into the fight & made their voices heard. And it made a difference.

We wouldn’t have a strong @CFPB today without President @BarackObama & Vice President @JoeBiden. They believed in my idea for the agency, fought to keep it in the bill, and helped to get it across the finish line. I’m eternally grateful their leadership.

Here’s the way I see it: before the ink from President @BarackObama's pens were dry, Wall Street’s army of lawyers & lobbyists were already out to kill the agency. Trump’s team has spent 3+ years trying their hardest to break it. But the @CFPB is still here & here to stay.

Things aren't easy at the @CFPB right now. @MickMulvaneyOMB & @CFPBDirector Kraninger gutted the office that fights lending discrimination & have given the green light for payday lenders to trap consumers in cycles of debt.

I talk & tweet about the @CFPB every chance I get because I'm proud of that new agency. It has handled more than 2 million complaints & returned billions back into the pockets of Americans cheated by big banks & financial institutions. That’s government that works for the people.

Ten years ago today, I ran out of a hearing, jumped into @SenatorDurbin’s car, & we raced as fast as we could across town to watch President @BarackObama sign the Dodd-Frank Wall Street reform bill into law. I'll never forget it – because that's how the @CFPB was born. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Edde6MxWoAArv1v.jpg

RT @TVietor08 The comments by @RepTedYoho about @AOC didn't happen in a vacuum. Republicans and right-wing media outlets have spent years lying about, demonizing and dehumanizing her. It's not a coincidence that Fox News's favorite targets are women of color like AOC, Rep. Omar, Susan Rice.

We must change our priorities. Add your name to say you support a 10% cut in annual Pentagon spending to allow for investments in jobs, education, health care and poverty reduction in America’s most vulnerable communities. https://act.berniesanders.com/signup/reduce-pentagon-budget?source=tw200721
